characters.story: "Hwahn!" Fire and sled dogs commanded sharply - glowing, radiant and brilliant!
The strokes unite to show whirl, asking "Shyuan? Spin?" curiously!
This character represents kiss, whispering "Wun" softly - a vivid image to remember!
"Tsohng!" Bound up heart sang cheerfully - hurriedly, hastily and rushed!
The metal takes the shape of tin, asking "Shee? Metal?" curiously!
The heart takes the shape of watchful, shouting "Tee!" sharply!
This character represents bits, shouting "Shyeh!" sharply - a vivid image to remember!
See how the water forms urine? It shouts "Nyao!" sharply like ripples spreading across a pond!
Picture brush taking form - it sings "Shwah!" with vivid energy!
A striking symbol for rhinoceros that sings "Shee!" cheerfully!
Picture tardy taking form - it asks "Chir? Late?" with vivid energy!
With rain combined with water, you get leak - "Loh!" rings out sharply!
The strokes unite to show fart, shouting "Pee!" sharply - a vivid image to remember!
Picture footwear taking form - it whispers "Lyoo" with vivid energy!
The strokes unite to show excrement, whispering "Shir" softly!
The strokes unite to show folding screen, asking "Ping, is that a partition?" curiously!
"Chyoo!" The flag at the exit sang cheerfully - knuckle under, yield and submit!
Like a hand, this character means excavate and asks "Jyueh? Dig?"!
A striking symbol for ruler that whispers "Chir" softly - a vivid image to remember!
Like an eye, this character means eyebrows and asks "May? Brow?"!
Picture flatter taking form - it shouts "May!" with vivid energy!
When the door meets the body, they form shoulder, singing "Jyan!" cheerfully!
"Doo!" Woman at the door commanded sharply - jealous of, envious hateful bully!
When the door meets the water, they form tears, shouting "Lay!" sharply!
With a door combined with a mouth, you get enlighten - "Chee" rings out curiously!
